text: A feature request for Amazon re S3
description: Give us an option to make URLs case insensitive.

subs.text: Give us an option to make URLs case-insensitive.

Background: I ported my blog to S3 a few years ago. It works great. Love it. But I ported from a server that has case-insensitive names. That has resulted in broken links. I discover them when I have to go back through the archive myself.
I can patch things up manually with redirects, and do, but it would fix a lot of broken links to have the option to make URLs case-insensitive.
